credit_line: Selection from the Peterson Collection, Gift of William Bingham II
title: Evening party on terrace of a garden
inscriptions: calligraphic inscription; l.l. stamped in red: [artist's seal]; verso u.c., collection label: [Laufer Catalogue; verso u.c. in red pencil: M [encircled]; verso u.r. typed on blue label: WILLIAMS; verso u.r. on blue label in red pencil: 32 [underlined];  verso l.c. typed on old label: PC No.32
